Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: scaffold Glupp MVP - beer rating webapp

Complete Next.js 14 MVP with Auth, Duel \(ELO\), Collection \(Pokedex\),
Ranking, and Profile pages. Includes Supabase schema, 50 seed beers,
TypeScript types, XP/gamification system, and Glupp design system.

Stack: Next.js 14 App Router + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Supabase + Zustand + Framer Motion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
